snippet: Gervais's relationship with other celebrities and his own celebrity status has been something of a moving target, the source of much comedy and, occasionally, some authentic discomfort.
abstract: Gervais's relationship with other celebrities and his own celebrity status has been something of a moving target, the source of much comedy and, occasionally, some authentic discomfort.

headline.main: How Ricky Gervais Deals With Fame and the Famous
